Description.Text: Close to the Spanish Steps, in the heart of Rome`s upmarket shopping district, the Spagna Royal Suite is an elegant and fashionable boutique hotel featuring individually designed guestrooms and suites. Rooms are uniquely decorated and furnished with an eye for detail and may include a Turkish bath, an elegant balcony overlooking Via Frattina, a sauna, or a bathtub in the shape of a giant, red, high-heeled shoe. Several rooms also feature 19th-century frescoed ceilings, wooden or mosaic floors, and even circular beds. All rooms include a bathroom with TV and chromotherapy shower, air conditioning, soundproofing, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Set on the fourth floor of an historical building, the Spagna Royal Suite hotel also offers an elegant reception area, breakfast served daily in the dining room, and room service. The front desk is 24-hours and concierge services are also available.
